Today, I prepared a simple and authentic rice flavoured with Jeera, Peas and other spices. You can serve it with any kind of gravy curry for extra zest and richness in Jeera Rice ğŸš   Let's start with ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Basmati Rice ğŸšÂ - 160 gms - 1 cup
  • Water - 2 cups
  • Cumin seeds - 1 1/2 tb sp
  • Cumin powder - 1 tb sp
  • Green chillies - 4 - chopped
  • Butter - 2 tb sp
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Green peas - 80 gms
  • Onion - sliced - 1/2 cup
  • Bay leaf ğŸƒÂ - 1
  • Clove - 1
  • Cinnamon - 1/2 inch piece
Procedure:
  • Add rice in a bowl and wash twice with water
  • Strain water and add washed rice in rice cooker
  • Heat a skillet pan over medium heat
  • Add Butter, clove, cinnamon, bay leaf & cumin seeds
  • Let them splutter
  • Next add green chillies, onion & peas
  • Saute 1 min and add cumin powder & salt..mix well
  • Turn off heat and transfer this to rice cooker
  • Add water .. mix gently with spatula
  • I cooked rice in electric rice cooker ( you can also use pressure cooker and cook for 2 whistles )
  • Rice cooked well.. mix gently with spatula and serve
  • Serve it hot withÂ Cauliflower/Gobi Butter Masala || Side Dish || Restaurant Style ğŸ™‚
